title: The Rush Limbaugh Show Podcast
itunes:title: The Rush Limbaugh Show Podcast
description:
PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 1:

Democrat-run states are hell-bent on whatever carnage they need to blame on Trump. Lindsey Graham questions Antifa's role in violence. Antifa filled with rich, Ivy League graduates. Democrat Party politics comes home to roost. De Blasio was going to pull swimmers out of the water during virus lockdown. Drive-By Media distorts Trump, Barr use of word "dominate". Cuomo says De Blasio, NYPD didn't do their job, threatens to call in National Guard. Democrats have run their cities for years, we had 8 years of Obama as president, why haven't they made things better for African-Americans? Why do Republicans or "white supremacy" continue to be blamed. Citizens fleeing cities in droves due to coronavirus, riots. Only people left in blue states will be underclass and social justice warriors. Long-time caller Vinny, who fled New York, buys a gun in North Carolina.

PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 2:

Trump speech, walk to St. John's Church was more reassuring to the American people than the media can comprehend. Media spent all day saying Trump was hiding in White House, Trump blew it to smithereens. If Obama did the same thing, the media would have hailed it as the second coming of Jesus Christ. Vinny, formerly of Queens, now living in NC, fears a civil war. More thoughts on Rush's Breakfast Club interview. Where are Obama and Oprah appealing for calm? Plugs makes speech, rips Trump, media praises. What if de Blasio and Cuomo are trying to force Trump to send troops into New York, so they can blame death on him? Clinton used Bible as prop during Lewinsky scandal. What happened to coronavirus, social distancing, fear of second wave? All gone so people can protest. Little violence in Washington last night after Trump action.

PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 3:

Tweet calls on rioters to burn down plantations in Southern states, Twitter doesn't take it down. Biden urges cops to shoot people in the leg, not the heart. Raleigh police chief says cops won't be put in danger to protect property. Protests ramp up again across country. Caller reports protests moving to suburbs. The violence and the riots are an offshoot of the Democrat Party: Never let a good crisis go to waste. Pushback against Trump declaring Antifa a terrorist organization. White supremacy and white privilege is a catchall for saying America will never be fair, laying groundwork for getting rid of the Constitution.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
